apps.name: Google Forms
apps.description: Google Forms is an easy way to collect data from the web with a simple UI and powerful editor. Works hand-in-hand with Google Sheets!

apps.name: Typeform
apps.description: Typeform helps you ask awesomely online! If you ever need to run a survey, questionnaire, form, contest etc. Typeform will help you achieve it beautifully across all devices, every time, using its next generation platform.

apps.name: Calendly
apps.description: Calendly is an elegant and simple scheduling tool for businesses that eliminates email back and forth. It helps save time so that businesses can provide great service and increase sales.

apps.name: Salesforce
apps.description: Salesforce is a leading enterprise customer relationship manager (CRM) application.

apps.name: Jotform
apps.description: The newly redesigned Jotform lets you build forms faster than ever, with powerful widgets and a responsive editor that works offlineâ€”without even needing to sign up for an account.

apps.name: Gravity Forms
apps.description: Gravity Forms is a premier WordPress plugin that makes it easy to create powerful forms on the fly.

apps.name: Pipedrive
apps.description: Pipedrive is sales pipeline and CRM software for deal makers. Get super-organized. Close deals in less time. iOS and Android apps let you take your pipeline with you anywhere.

apps.name: Squarespace Forms
apps.description: Squarespace is a website builder, blogging platform, hosting service, commerce platform, and domain name registrar.

apps.name: Google Contacts
apps.description: Google Contacts, the address book built into Gmail, lets you keep track of all your contacts, see when you last interacted with them, and more.

apps.name: Tally
apps.description: The simplest way to create beautiful forms and surveys, for free.

apps.name: Acuity Scheduling
apps.description: Easy online appointment scheduling software. Save time by having clients book appointments, complete custom intake forms, and pay in advance 24/7 anywhere in the world.

apps.name: Zoho CRM
apps.description: Zoho CRM is an AI-powered sales CRM that empowers teams to work together better and close more deals.

apps.name: Follow Up Boss
apps.description: Simple lead management software for real estate agents and brokers. Follow Up Boss takes all your leads and puts them in one simple system automatically. Helps you to respond fast and convert more leads into closings.

apps.name: WPForms
apps.description: WPForms is a drag and drop online form builder for WordPress that allows you to easily create contact forms, email subscription forms, billing forms, donation forms, online order forms, and more.

apps.name: Docusign
apps.description: Docusign is an electronic signature technology and digital transaction management service for facilitating electronic exchanges of signed documents.

apps.name: Close
apps.description: Close is a sales productivity platform built to help you close more deals. With built-in calling, SMS, and emailâ€”your team can communicate with prospects and customers all in one place. Itâ€™s an "all-in-one" platform which you can use standalone without needing any other sales emails tools or calling products.

apps.name: Dubsado
apps.description: Dubsado is a platform that streamlines your client flow. Create repeatable processes, send contracts, get paid... and so much more.

apps.name: Circle
apps.description: A modern community platform for creators.

apps.name: Cognito Forms
apps.description: Cognito Forms is an easy-to-use form builder that allows users to quickly build a form, include it on their website, and start capturing entries without having to do any development.

apps.name: HoneyBook
apps.description: HoneyBook is the leading client-flow platform independent businesses use to showcase services, book clients, manage projects, and get paid.

apps.name: Jobber
apps.description: Jobber is the command center for home service businesses. Our easy-to-use app powers sales, operations, and customer serviceâ€”all in one place.

apps.name: Unbounce
apps.description: Unbounce is a landing page platform that helps you convert more visitors into leads, sales, and customers. Unbounce Conversion Intelligenceâ„¢ is AI powered-functionality that works with your marketing intuition to ensure the best campaign performance every time.

featuredApp.name: Zapier Lead Router
featuredApp.description: Zapier Lead Router is a Zapier product that makes it easy to route leads to sales reps.

TriggerActionListSection.title: Supported triggers and actions
TriggerActionListSection.subtitle: Zapier helps you create workflows that connect your apps to automate repetitive tasks. A trigger is an event that starts a workflow, and an action is an event a Zap performs.

JoinMillionsCTA.heading: Join millions worldwide who automate their work using Zapier
